text: God nɨbop mapen lɨl aglek, binɨb suŋtep ne mɨdebɨm.3.12-13 Epe 4.2 Anɨb ak nɨbi anɨgɨnɨmɨb. Binɨb okok kɨlop chɨb nɨŋɨd gɨtep gɨl, yɨmug nɨgɨnɨmɨb. Binɨb tam okok tek mɨdɨl, kabɨyam ma juwɨl, binɨb sayn tep okok yenɨmɨb. Mɨŋel ogɨnap ownɨgab ak, kɨmɨgel jɨmñɨl yenɨmɨb. Anɨb okok nɨbi bɨ kɨli chech koŋɨm lɨpal tek ak lɨnɨmɨb.
